example.name: it's a living
example.text: Composer Marc Marder earns his living *trace* playing the double bass in classical music ensembles.

example.name: dividends
example.text: In fiscal 1988 the company earned $17.3 million on revenue of $352.9 million.

example.name: benefactive
example.text: ...a relationship with the government that has earned the Mitsubishi group the dubious moniker of "seisho".

example.name: with source
example.text: Xerox Corp.'s third-quarter net income grew 6.2% on 7.3% higher revenue, *trace* earning mixed reviews from Wall Street analysts.

roleset.note: Arg3 could also be used for "on holdings of $16 million" when reporting dividend yield and such.
